description: Lists the data sets imported for a specific application. In Amazon Web Services Mainframe Modernization, data sets are associated with applications deployed on runtime environments. This is known as importing data sets. Currently, Amazon Web Services Mainframe Modernization can import data sets into catalogs using CreateDataSetImportTask.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the application for which you want to list the associated data sets.

nested_items.name: dataSets
nested_items.description: The list of data sets, containing information including the creation time, the data set name, the data set organization, the data set format, and the last time the data set was referenced or updated.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the data set was created.

nested_items.name: dataSetName
nested_items.description: The name of the data set.

nested_items.name: dataSetOrg
nested_items.description: The type of data set. The only supported value is VSAM.

nested_items.name: format
nested_items.description: The format of the data set.

nested_items.name: lastReferencedTime
nested_items.description: The last time the data set was referenced.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The last time the data set was updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If there are more items to return, this contains a token that is passed to a subsequent call to this operation to retrieve the next set of items.
